items.value:
I found a way to get you to the Gang!
There is a book that learns some Clothes, including Gang Clothes.
I can get you this Book but we need something for that.

Get Michael:
3x Special Delivery Box (for the gang)
3x Ganja (for the gang)

The Gang absolutely wants these Boxes and the Ganja, get them!
i have the Stuff and 3x free Inv. Slots!

You are really fast, amazing!
I give the things to the Gang Leader.

Here's your Reward:
1x Home Phone (Book)
1x The Aracnist Tisanes Book (Book)
5x Blue Cow (Energydrink)

Come back when you dressed like a Gang Member.
You may need a Sewing Table for that!

Sorry but we need things for the Gang!
Come back when you have the things.

The Gang Boss is really into Sergio's Stuff, Sergio is my best friend but we have to do it to survive!

We'll take things back to Sergio later ..
